UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Myticofensin, a novel antimicrobial peptide family identified from Mytilus coruscus
Literature.Author: Liu L, He M, Yang Z, Wang H, Zhang X, He J, Isabella B, Qi P, Yan X, Liao Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=<3.9µM),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 33842(no activity data),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 19659(no activity data),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MIC=<3.9µM),Vibrio fluvialis ATCC 33809(MIC=15.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(no activity data),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19161(MIC=<3.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=<3.9µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 19659(MIC=<3.9µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(no activity data),Bacillus licheniformis ATCC 14580(MIC=7.8µM)
